publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5560 Mr Andy Kerr: The Draft Mental Health (Safety and Security) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2007—That the Health Committee recommends that the draft Mental Health (Safety and Security) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2007 be approved. Supported by: Lewis Macdonald*

S2M-5560 Mr Andy Kerr: The Draft Mental Health (Safety and Security) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2007—That the Health Committee recommends that the draft Mental Health (Safety and Security) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2007 be approved. Supported by: Lewis Macdonald
